text: Mark Tseitlin (; ; 23 September 1943 - 25 January 2022) was a Soviet-born Israeli chess player. He was awarded the title of International Master in 1978 and that of Grandmaster in 1997. Tseitlin was born in Frunze, Kyrgyz SSR, Soviet Union. Tseitlin died in Beer Sheva, Israel on 25 January 2022, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Kyrgyzstani people Category:Israeli sportspeople
title: Mark Tseitlin
